S08n689:394: tacca yāvajjīvaṃ dhārayati bhagavato buddhasyāgrataḥ śatasahasraṃ japaṃ kṛtvā pannagabandhaṃ karoti |
S08n689:396: ardharātre pañca dīnāraśatāni pratilabhate ardhaṃ ratnatrayopayojyam |
S08n689:399: kārttikaśuklapakṣe kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ śākāhāro vā poṣadhikaḥ pañcadaśyāṃ trirātroṣito vaikaṅkataphalānāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:403: śucau bhūpradeśe gocarmamātraṃ maṇḍalamupalipya tanmadhye padmākārāṃ vediṃ kṛtvā gandhapuṣpadhūpavicitrabaliṃ kṛtvā vaikaṅkatasamidhānā sugatavitastipramāṇānāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:411: yadi na paśyati na sidhyati ekavārāhiṃ gatvā gandhapuṣpadhūpabalividhānaṃ kṛtvā sakalāṃ rātriṃ japet |
S08n689:418: palāśakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya araṇyagomayānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:422: sa vaktavyaḥ - ‘mama dine dine dīnāramekaṃ dehi’ |
S08n689:425: bhagavataḥ pādau spṛśeti vaktavyaḥ tataḥ siddho bhavati |
S08n689:426: athavā na dadādi bilvaphalānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ sadhātuke caitye paṭasyāgrataḥ ekarātroṣitaḥ vaikaṅkatasamidhāgniṃ prajvālya aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:434: puṣṭimicchatā kṣīravṛkṣasamidhānāmagniṃ prajvālya trisandhyaṃ tilataṇḍulānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:439: astamite vrīhituṣāṇāṃ nāma gṛhītvā vāmahastena juhuyāt |
S08n689:441: rājasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya tilataṇḍulānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ trisandhyaṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:443: gaṅgāyāmusalaśabdarahite śucau pradeśe ubhayakūlamṛttikāṃ gṛhya sacaturasrāṃ saptahastāṃ vedikāṃ kṛtvā madhye sahasrapatraṃ padmaṃ kṛtvā tasyopari sugatavitastipramāṇaṃ pañcalohitakaṃ cakraṃ pratiṣṭhāpya maṇḍalamadhye paṭasyāgrataḥ sādhayitavya gandhapuṣpaiḥ śvetacandanairarcayitvā mandārakaraktapuṣpamālāṃ datvā tato gandhādibhiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpamālā sapta deyā caturdiśaṃ catvāro ghṛtakumbhāḥ prajvālayitavyāḥ |
S08n689:444: caturdiśaṃ catvāraḥ kalaśāḥ sarvabījapūrṇakā ratnāni ca prakṣipya sthāpayitavyā |
S08n689:446: balividhānaṃ kṛtvā caturdiśaṃ pūrvoktena dadhibhakto'pūpakaṃ deyam |
S08n689:450: tataḥ palāśasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya apāmārgasamidhānāṃ saptābhimantritānāṃ ghṛtānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:453: rājavṛkṣasamidbhirigniṃ prajvālya lavaṇamayīṃ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā śirādārabhya ekaikāmāhutiṃ saptābhimantritāṃ yāvaccaraṇāviti nāmaṃ grahāya aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:455: śuklapañcadaśyāmaṣṭamyāṃ vā poṣadhiko'horātroṣito'patitagomayaṃ gṛhya gocarmamātrasthaṇḍilamupalipya sadhātuke caitye āryamañjuśriyasya rajatamaye vā bhājane kapilāyāḥ goḥ samānavatsāyāḥ kumārīmathitaṃ navanītaṃ gṛhya kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ vāmahastena bhājanaṃ gṛhyaṃ dakṣiṇahastenānāmikāyāmaṅguhyā āloḍayaṃ tāvajjaped yāvadūṣmāyati |
S08n689:464: aṣṭaśatābhimantritāṃ vācāṃ dakṣiṇahaste badhvā yāvat sarvatrottaravādī bhavati |
S08n689:469: dāruṇena sarpeṇa daṣṭasya nāmaṃ grahāya saptābhimantritamudakacūrṇakaṃ pānāya deyam |
S08n689:476: māryupadrave nagaramadhye vā ardharātrau sthaṇḍilakamupalipya śuklaṃ baliṃ kṛtvā kṣīravṛkṣasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya kṣīrāhutisahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:479: tato'nyatamasmin divase madhyāhnavelāyāṃ śleṣmātakasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya siddhārthānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:481: anena vidhinā kṛtena viṣamabandhaḥ yāvantaḥ sattvā te tasya vaśā bhavanti |
S08n689:494: vīrakrayakrītāṃ manaḥśilāṃ gṛhītvārājavṛkṣasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālyaṃ tāvajjaped yāvadagnivarṇā bhavati |
S08n689:495: tataḥ samānavatsāyāḥ goḥ kapilāyāḥ kanyāmathitena navanītena kṛtvā tasmiṃ ghṛte nirvāpayet |
S08n689:497: tataḥ anenaiva rakṣāṃ kṛtvā samudgake sthāpya candragrahe trirātroṣitena sadhātuke caitye āryamañjuśriyasyāgrataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā uttarāmukhenāśvatthapatracatuṣṭaye sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvadūṣmāyati |
S08n689:501: rocanayā ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ – śuklapañcadaśyāṃ padmapatre sthāpya āryamañjuśriyasyāgrataḥ karasampuṭena gṛhītvā tāvajjaped yāvat trividhā siddhiḥ |
S08n689:503: saptarātraṃ pañcalohena padmaṃ kṛtvā kuṅkumarocanakarpūramudake piṣṭvā padmaṃ mrakṣayitvā tataḥ śuklāṣṭamyāmupoṣadhikena triḥkālasnāyinā śucivastraprāvṛtena sadhātuke caitye āryamañjuśriyasyāgrataḥ dakṣiṇena hastena gṛhītena tāvajjaped yāvat prajvalati |
S08n689:507: evaṃ śailaraktacandanaṃ guggulaṃ nandyāvartamūlaṃ girikarṇikātuṣaṃ vrīhikuṣṭhatagaraṃ madhu pippalī turuṣkaṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā samabhāgāni kārayet |
S08n689:508: tataḥ kapilāyāḥ samānavatsāyāḥ goḥ kṣīraṃ gṛhya kanyāmathitena navanītena modayitvā gulikāṃ kārayet |
S08n689:510: tata upoṣadhikena śuklacaturdaśyāmahorātropitaḥ aśvatthapatrāntaritā gulikāṃ kṛtvā āryamañjuśriyasyāgratastāvajjaped yāvad dhūmāyati |
S08n689:515: sadhātuke caitye paṭasyāgrataḥ poṣadhikenodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā arkasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ khadirasamidhānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:521: atha rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā vaśīkartukāmo bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā rājavṛkṣasamidhānāṃ iṅgudatailāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:524: caturvarṇaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ pāyasaṃ haviṣyānnamānīya peyakrasarā ceti juhuyāt |
S08n689:528: krodhamupaśamanaṃ piṇḍakatuṣahomena vā kanyāvaśīkaraṇe tilāṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:530: aṣṭasahasraṃ saptarātraṃ vacāṃ aṣṭasahasrābhimantritāṃ kṛtvā haste badhvā yaṃ yācayati taṃ labhate |
S08n689:531: nityajāpena pratyaṅgirā padmasūtrādinā aṣṭasahasrābhimantritena yasya haste badhnāti tasya rakṣā kṛtā bhavati |
S08n689:533: saptarātram kulapatikāmaḥ gandhāṃ juhuyāt saptarātam dhṛtāktāṃ |
S08n689:535: puṣpamaṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ yasya dadāti sa vaśo bhavati |
S08n689:536: kuṅkumatagaratālīsapatraṃ samṛṇālaśatapuṣpaśrīveṣṭasamāyuktaṃ vidhinābhimantritaṃ rājadvāre vastraya mālabhaṃ strīpuruṣaprayuktavaśīkaraṇaṃ yuddhavijayakaraṇam dhvajamaṣṭasahasravārāṃ parijapya gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ cābhimantrayitvā sapta dadhikuṇḍeṣu ardhyaṃ visajayet |
S08n689:538: kṛṣṇatilāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā yasya nāmaṃ grahāya bhakṣayati savaśo bhavati |
S08n689:539: aṣṭasahasrajaptā sarvabījāni sarvauṣadhyaḥ sarvagandhāni ca surabhipuṣpāṇi padmaṃ vā sarvāṇi akālamūlakalaśe prakṣipya,
S08n689:544: padmaṃ vā padmapatraṃ vā nirdhūmeṣu aṅgāreṣu yasya nāmnā juhoti sa vaśyo bhavati |
S08n689:560: tato'ṣṭamyāṃ prabhṛti vikasitānāṃ śvetapadmānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ trisandhyamaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:621: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ gaurasarṣapāṇāṃ ghṛtāktānāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ rātrau divasaṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:629: paṭasyāgrataḥ gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ vā kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ padmaṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:636: paṭasyāgrato dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ padmānāṃ śatasahasraṃ juhuyāt kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ |
S08n689:655: viṣayamapi labhate paṭasyāgrata ādhārako'gnimupasamādhāya pratidinaṃ varddhamānā pūjā kāryā |
S08n689:723: vidyādharamantardhānaṃ vā pādapracārikaṃ vā śrutidharatvaṃ dadāti |
S08n689:724: atha gulikāṃ sādhayitukāmena karṇikārakesaraṃ nāgakesaraṃ śvetacandanaṃ gajamadaṃ cekīkṛtya,
S08n689:759: ātmanaḥ śāntiṃ karttukāmena trisandhyaṃ kṣīraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:761: mahādevasya dakṣiṇāṃ mūrttiṃ tāmrabhājane ghṛtaṃ sthāpya,
S08n689:769: rajate vā tāmre vā ghṛtaṃ sthāpya,
S08n689:779: ayantrita ātmanaḥ sakhāyānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kṛtvā tāvajjaped,
S08n689:816: kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāmahorātroṣitena kapilāyā goḥ samānavatsāyā apatitagomayenāryamañjuśriyaṃ kṛtvā,
S08n689:858: śvetārkasyādhastādāryamañjuśriyasya gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ ca datvā mālyaṃ cāṣṭasahasraṃ japet |
S08n689:863: tasyā mṛttikayā pūrvakṛtaṃ pratimāmudramarkakṣīreṇa pratimudrāṃ kṛtvā,
S08n689:865: yāvadaṣṭamīti triḥ kālaṃ bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā baliṃ dadyāt |
S08n689:873: arthamutpādayitukāmena goṣṭaṃ gatvā kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ parebhyaḥ kṣīrayāvakāhāro lakṣaṃ japet |
S08n689:874: aparasmiṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ te tato'horātroṣitena tatraiva śatasahasraṃ japtavyam |
S08n689:894: evaṃ dine dine gandhādīn dattvā yāvadaṣṭottaraṃ stūpasahasraṃ pūrṇamiti paṭṭabandhamavāpnoti tilānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:899: āpyāyanaṃ karttukāmo bhagavato'grataḥ kṣīravṛkṣasamidhānāṃ ghṛtāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:925: sā ced vidyā sādhyamānā na siddhyati;
S08n689:926: tāmanena mantreṇa sametaṃ bhagavato buddhasyāgrataḥ paṭasya ca pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
S08n689:939: atha śāntiṃ kartukāmaḥ bhagavato'grataḥ kṣīrāhutyāṣṭasahasraṃ gandhodakena vābhyukṣayet |
S08n689:943: valmīkaśikharamāruhya nirāhāra ekapāda pūrvāhnād yāvadaparāhṇaṃ japet |
S08n689:960: evaṃ vaśīkaraṇe kṛṣṇayorekatareṇa trirātroṣitaḥ kṛtarakṣaḥ suyantritaḥ paṭasyāgrato nirdhūmāṅgārairguggulugulikānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:1000: saptajaptena śvetapuṣpeṇa gugguludhūpena vā grahagṛhītānāṃ snāpayata |
S08n689:1005: sadhātuke caitye pūrṇamāsyāṃ sagauraveṇa maṇḍalakamupalipyāṣṭau pūrṇakalaśā aṣṭau ca puṣpamālāgaruturuṣkacandanakundurudhūpaṃ duhatā tāvajjapet |
S08n689:1007: sadhātuke caitye kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ yathāvi bhavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā śatasahasraṃ japet |
S08n689:1011: vaśīkaraṇaṃ antardhānaḥ śilādiṣu prayogeṣu susamartho bhavati |
S08n689:1019: tilahomena naranārīvaśīkaraṇaṃ viśitavikrayena rakṣā ātmarakṣā pararakṣā,
S08n689:1021: yuddhe rājakule vivāda japamānasya vijayo bhavati |
S08n689:1022: ātmanā abhiṣekaṃ karttukāmaścatvāraḥ kalaśā akālanadīpalvalaprasravaṇodake vā sarvagandhavījāni prakṣipya aṣṭasahasrābhimantritāni kṛtvā,
S08n689:1041: sahasrasampātāhutiṃ bhagavato'grataḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
S08n689:1064: sarvamudrā bhedabhasmanā bhogārthī nadīsaṅgame taḍāgānāmekatame'nyatra vā śucipradeśe paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya jāpahomaṃ samārabhet |
S08n689:1111: prātarvelākāle tato bhojane prathamamālāpaṃ trayo vārāṃ parijapya bhoktavyam |
S08n689:1116: evaṃ divasāni sapta udakaṃ saptavārāṃ parijapya,
S08n689:1125: trayo vārāṃ cīvarakarṇakaṃ parijapya cīvarakarṇikaṃ bandhitavyam |
S08n689:1138: sarvasattvā stambhanaṃ manasīkaraṇe śuklapūrṇamābhyāṃ paṭasyāgrato bodhivṛkṣakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya,
S08n689:1172: raktasūtreṇa pariveṣṭya śarāvasampuṭaṃ sadhātuke caitye pratimāyāgrataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
S08n689:1185: pūrṇapūrṇapañcadaśyāṃ poṣadhikaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ padmānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi juhuyāt |
S08n689:1190: ante trirātropitaḥ pañcadaśyāṃ sadhātuke caitye pratimāyā pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
S08n689:1212: madanaputtalikāṃ sarvālaṅkāropetāṃ rājavṛkṣakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya śalākayā viddhā tāpayet |
S08n689:1237: divasāni sapta jvarapreṣaṇaṃ bhūtapreṣaṇaṃ ātmarakṣā vetāḍotthāpanaṃ bilapraveśaṃ vanapraveśaṃ rakṣā sīmābandhaḥ diśābandhaḥ coravyāghraḍākinīnāṃ jāpena stambhitā bhavatīti |
S08n689:1241: tataḥ śatapuṣpāyā vīrakraye krītvā dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:1249: marīcaphalaṃ saptavārānabhimantrya mukhe prakṣipya yasya alāpaṃ dadāti |
S08n689:1251: sadhātuke caitye buddhapratimāyā agrataḥ kṛtvā udake kṣipet |
S08n689:1256: puṣpeṇa phalena vā lakṣajaptena maśakā na bhavanti |
S08n689:1258: rājadvārikaṃ dantakāṣṭhabhakṣaṇaṃ phaladānaṃ gandhadānaṃ bhūmibandhaṃ corabandhaṃ sarvadaṃṣṭrāstambhanaṃ upajambhanaṃ nigaḍasphoṭanaṃ udakastambhanaṃ agnistambhanaṃ viṣomārjanaṃ viṣasaṅkramaṇaṃ viṣabandhaḥ bhūtavaśīkaraṇaṃ ḍākinīgrahamokṣaṇaṃ naṣṭavidyāyā gorocanayā bhūrjapatre likhitvā bhagavato'grataḥ sadhātuke caitye śatavārāṃ japet |
S08n689:1260: saptajaptvā siddhārthakāṃ grāme vā nagare vā kṣipet |
S08n689:1264: striyaṃ puruṣaṃ vā vaśīkartukāmo yasya yato bhāge gṛham;
S08n689:1269: oṣadhabandhaṃ manasā nidhānabandhaṃ khadirakīlakairekaviṃśatisaptanidhānasthāneṣu caturṣu koṇeṣu nikhanet |
S08n689:1271: candragrahe bhikṣuṇā śrāvayitavyāḥ sarvairetaiḥ kalpasthāyī brahmacāryapratihatagatiryatheṣṭaṃ vicarati |
S08n689:1305: tataḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ candagrahe vā sarvakāmikāṃ baliṃ datvā,
S08n689:1325: raktacandanamayaṃ ṣoḍaśāṅgulaṃ dvādaśāṅgulaṃ vā poṣadhikena karmakāreṇa daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ kārayet |
S08n689:1341: rājā vā rājamātro vā vaśī bhavati |
S08n689:1342: kṣīrāhāraḥ śākāhāro vā poṣadhikaḥ sadhātuke caitye lakṣatrayaṃ japet |
S08n689:1357: surabhipuṣpāṃ jalajāni vā sthalajāni vā sugandhī nivedyaṃ vā gāvyaghṛtapradīpatrayaṃ ca |
S08n689:1374: strīvaśyārthaṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ lalāṭāṃ madhvāktānāmekaviṃśati āhutī juhuyāt trisandhyaṃ saptarātram |
S08n689:1432: vidyādharatvaṃ rājyamathavā yādṛśo bhagavān tādṛśo bhavāmi |
S08n689:1433: eṣā siddhiḥ kāruṇikena sarvasattvānāṃ nirāmiṣacittena dānaṃ dadatā sidhyati |
S08n689:1441: tena samālabdhagātraḥ saṅgrāme dūte aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:1448: triḥ kālasnāyī payobhakṣaḥ mūlapaṭasyāgrataḥ aṣṭaśatiko japo deyaḥ |
S08n689:1449: paścādaṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ yathāśaktya pūjāṃ kṛtvā paṭasyāgrataḥ kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ vilvasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:1456: paṭasyāgrataḥ śvetacandanena maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā gandhadhūpapuṣpabalivilepanaṃ ca datvā keśarapuṣpāṇāṃ śatatrayaṃ gṛhītvā aṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ ghṛtapradīpatrayaṃ prajvālya udumbassamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya ekaikaṃ puṣpamaṣṭaśatabhimantritaṃ kṛtvā ghṛtābhyaktānāṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:1458: yaḥ trikālaṃ parivartayati tasya pañcānantaryāṇi tanvībhavanti |
S08n689:1461: cakṣuṣāṃ yaṃ paśyati sa vaśo bhavati |
S08n689:1467: āryamañjuśriyaṃ pūrvoktena vidhānena paṭake phaleka vā aśleṣakairvarṇaiścitrāpayitavyaḥ |
S08n689:1469: kuśasaṃstaraśāyī kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ triḥkālasnāyī śucivastraprāvṛtenāṣṭāṅgapoṣadhikena pratipadamārabhya japo deyaḥ yāvat pañcadaśīti |

S08n689:1476: paurṇamāsyāṃ trirātropitena udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā sarvarātriko jāpo deyaḥ |
S08n689:1480: āveśanaṃ dhūpena vipanāśanaṃ pallavena ātmarakṣā jāpena śuklacaturdaśyāmārabhya yāvat pañcadaśīti śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena aṣṭāṅgapoṣadhikena paṭasyāgrato yaṃ mṛgayati taṃ labhate |
S08n689:1486: śuklacaturdaśyāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ udumbarakāṣṭhaiḥ agniṃ prajvālya udumbarasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:1488: aṃdhaḥ poṣadhiko kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ dīpānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ prajvālya dīpavartīnāmaṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:1491: vadhiraḥ pustakaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ praveśayitvā aṣṭasahasrābhimantritānāṃ padmānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:1495: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ kṛṣṇapañcamyāṃ sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā udārāṃ baliṃ nivedya bāhyā sarvabhautikāṃ baliṃ nivedya priyaṅgucūrṇena puttalikāṃ kṛtvā likhet |
S08n689:1496: maṇḍalabandhaṃ diśābandhaṃ kṛtvā kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ tāvajjaped yāvadulkāpātaṃ bhavati |
S08n689:1503: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāmahorātroṣitaḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā akṣataṃ sarvaṃ gṛhya gandhapuṣpairalaṅkṛtya dhūpena ca dakṣiṇahastena gṛhya tāvajjaped yāvajjvalitamiti |
S08n689:1504: paṭasyāgrataḥ āryamañjuśriyasya rocanāṃ sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvajjalitamiti |
S08n689:1508: yaṃ mantro payati sa vaśo bhavati |
S08n689:1510: kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāmahorātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrato bilvakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya vaikaṅkatasamidhānāṃ kaṭutailāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:1511: saptāhaṃ kanyāṃ yāmicchati sā vaśā bhavati |
S08n689:1512: kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ ekarātroṣitaḥ śmaśānaṃ gatvā apatitagomayena maṇḍalamupalipya akṣatakapālaṃ gṛhya raktacandanena prakṣālya raktapuṣpadhūpaiścābhyarcya tata upaviśya taṃ kapālaṃ mantraṃ japatā karṣayet |
S08n689:1514: yamaṅgulyāmākarṣati sa āgacchati tat sarvaṃ karoti śāntiṃ kartukāmena paṭasyāgrataḥ lakṣaṃ japet |
S08n689:1522: śuklapratipadamārabhya paṭasyāgrataḥ ghṛtakṣīrasahitāṃ tāmrabhājane sthāpya aṣṭaśatajaptpaṃ kṛtvā pibed divasāni sapta |
S08n689:1528: kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāmahorātroṣitaḥ nirbhayena bhūtvā tato vidyādhareṇa saptābhimantritena siṃhastāḍayitavyaḥ |
S08n689:1537: yadā mriyati tadā yatrecchati tatra utpadyati |
S08n689:1539: punaḥ siṃhasādhanaṃ kartukāmena śuklapūrṇamāsyāṃ atyantamaunī kṣīrayāvakāhāro yāvadaparā paurṇamāsīti lakṣaṃ japet |
S08n689:1540: maunī pauṣadhiko vajrahataṃ kāṣṭhaṃ gṛhya kṣīre saptadivasāṃ sthāpayet |
S08n689:1541: tatodhṛtya śvetamṛttikayā candanodakaparivartitayā vajrahataṃ kāṣṭhaṃ snāpayet |
S08n689:1542: tataḥ sādhakaḥ poṣadhikena rūpakāreṇa siṃhaḥ kārayitavyaḥ |
S08n689:1543: tataḥ puṣyanakṣatre ratnatrayasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā saṅghoddiṣṭakabhikṣavo bhojayitavyā |
S08n689:1544: paṭasyāgrataḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā nānābali nivedya tataḥ sādhakena śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ dakṣiṇahastena siṃhamavaṣṭabhya tāvajjapet yāvat siṃhavaccalati |
S08n689:1560: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ sadhātuke caitya paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya paścāmānā mukhe pratiṣṭhāpya adṛśyo bhavati |
S08n689:1562: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ parvataśikhare paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya gandhapuṣpairdhūpairabhyarcya lakṣatrayaṃ japet |
S08n689:1563: tataḥ bhasma balmīkamṛttikayā ca poṣadhiko gṛhya kṣīreṇāloḍya mardayitvā sugatavitastipramāṇāṃ mayūraḥ poṣadhikena citrakareṇa aśleṣakairvarṇaiścitrāpayitavyaḥ |
S08n689:1564: vivikte pradeśe gatvā paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya gandhapuṣpadhūpairabhyarcya sarvabhūtikāṃ baliṃ datvā tataḥ śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena paṭasyāgrataḥ mayūraṃ sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvanmayūraścalati |
S08n689:1565: tato vidyādhareṇa aparājitapuṣpaiḥ pūrvaparijaptayā mūrtā śarāvasampuṭāṃ dakṣiṇahastenāvaṣṭabhya tāvajjapet yāvat śivārutaśabdaḥ śrūyate |
S08n689:1566: mantraṃ japatā sakhāyebhyo sattvā ātmano mukhe prakṣipya adṛśyo bhavati |
S08n689:1568: padmakesarasauvīramañjanaḥ śilāṃ samāṃ kṛtvā poṣadhikakanyāhaste pīṣayet |

S08n689:1572: vaṃśarocanāṃ gṛhya tṛlohapariveṣṭitānāṃ guḍikānāṃ kṛtvā tataḥ śuciśuklavāso śmaśānaṃ gatvā gandhapuṣpadhūpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā sārvabhautikaṃ baliṃ kṛtvā gulikā kapālasampuṭā pratiṣṭhāpya tāvajjaped yāvat kilakilāśavdaḥ śrūyate |
S08n689:1574: sahāyebhyo'pi vibhajya ātmano mukhe prakṣipya adṛśyo bhavati |
S08n689:1576: ulūkanetraṃ gṛhya añjanena saha kumārīhaste pīṣayet |
S08n689:1578: guṭikāṃ śarāvasampuṭe sthāpya maheśvarasya dakṣiṇīyāṃ mūrttau saptarātraṃ yakṣiṇīmākarṣayati |
S08n689:1581: rājārkamayīṃ pratimāṃ ṣaḍaṅgulaṃ kṛtvā aśleṣakairvarṇakaiścitrāpayitvā sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitā tasyāgrataḥ ṣaṇmāsāṃ japet |
S08n689:1584: paṭasyāgrataḥ maunī ṣaṇmāsāṃ vāmakaratalamabhimantrya ayutaṃ parijapyaṃ sunihitaṃ nidhānaṃ labhati |
S08n689:1585: rājārkānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi samudragāminīṃ nadīmavatīrya arkapuṭe juhuyāt |
S08n689:1595: mūlapaṭasyāgrataḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā cakraṃ svastikamaśvatthapatre sthāpya paryaṅkopaviṣṭaḥ tāvajjaped yāvajvalitamiti |
S08n689:1596: tena gṛhītamātreṇa ākuñcitakuṇḍalakeśaḥ uditādityavarṇaḥ vidyādharacakravartī bhavati |
S08n689:1597: yaiśca dṛśyate yāṃśca paśyati taiḥ sahotpatati |
S08n689:1598: sudarśanamūlikāṃ gṛhya hastenāvaṣṭabhya tāva sahasrajaptāṃ kṛtvā haste badhvā yaṃ spṛśati sa vaśo bhavati |
S08n689:1599: kuśamayaṃ cakraṃ gṛhītvā sahasraṃ japtvā jale prakṣipya nāgamuttiṣṭhati |
S08n689:1604: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā yat sādhayati tat sidhyati |
S08n689:1609: śuklapratipadamārabhya ahorātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ brahmīsakarṣagāvyaghṛtakarṣaṃ kṣīrakaṣaṃ aṣṭaśataṃ parijapya pibed divasāni sapta |
S08n689:1611: paṭasyāgrataḥ nānāprakārasya bhakṣabhojyapiṭakaṃ sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvad bhaktamantarhitaṃ bhavati |
S08n689:1614: kṛtapuraścaraṇastrilohamayaṃ ṣoḍaśāraṃ cakraṃ kṛtvā kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ ahorātroṣitaḥ tripathe pūjāṃ kṛtvā upaviṣṭaḥ kalāpamātrāṃ manaḥśilāṃ mukhe prakṣipya tāvajjaped yāvanmukhaṃ sphuṭati |
S08n689:1616: tilakaṃ kṛtvā adṛśyaḥ kāmarūpī pañcavarṣaśatāni jīvati |
S08n689:1618: avare kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ ahorātroṣitaḥ śmaśānaṃ gatvā triśūlasya mahatī pūjāṃ kṛtvā paryaṅkopaviṣṭaḥ dakṣiṇahastena tṛśūlaṃ gṛhya tāvajjaped yāvat tṛśūlād raśmirniścarati |
S08n689:1621: śucau deśe paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya ahorātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ puttalikāṃ kṛtvā vidhivat pūjayitvā bilvasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:1625: ahorātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ karavīrapuṣpāṇāmekaṃ gṛhya nāgasthānaṃ gatvā puṣpaṃ nāgahrade prakṣipya mantramāvartayet |
S08n689:1628: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ ahorātroṣitaḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyā jvaraṃnāśayitukāmo girikarṇikāpuṣpāṇāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:1633: vastre bhūrjapatre vā likhitvā dhvajāgre badhnīyāt |
S08n689:1635: udakasaktavāhāraḥ kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ vā trirātroṣita ekaliṅgaṃ gatvā liṅgopari dakṣiṇāyāṃ mūrtiṃ pādaṃ sthāpya vālaśollakena bandhayet muṣṭiṃ badhvā tāvajjaped yāvad rāvo niścarati marāmīti |
S08n689:1641: prātarutthāyodakaṃ saptābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā mukhaṃ prakṣālya yasya darśanaṃ dadāti sa vaśo bhavati |
S08n689:1642: evaṃ tailenāhārakāma udakacūlake saptābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā pibet |
S08n689:1644: rājakulaṃ praviśatā cīvarāttaṃ gṛhya ekaviṃśativārāṃ parijapya vāmahastena granthiṃ kṛtvā apratihatavākyo bhavati |
S08n689:1647: cchinnabhinnādhikānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ śālivrīhiśvetakaravīrasiddhārthakaiḥ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā paṭasyāgrataḥ vāmahastenāvaṣṭabhyāṣṭasahasraṃ japet |
S08n689:1650: anenaiva vidhānena ghṛtasarjarasaṃ dahatā śatasahasraṃ japet |
S08n689:1652: anenaiva vidhānena stūpaṃ kṛtvā candanābhyaktānāṃ padmānāṃ śatasahasraṃ nivedayet |
S08n689:1654: sugatavitastipramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ kṛtvā dhūpaṃ ca dahatā campakapuṣpāṇāṃ śatasahasraṃ nivedayet |
S08n689:1656: sugatavitastipramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ kṛtvā pratikṛtimālikhya vāmapādenāvaṣṭabhya aṣṭasahasraṃ japet |
S08n689:1658: sugatavitastipramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ kṛtvā vivāhalājānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāmagnāvaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:1660: prabhāte snātvā anenaiva mantreṇa nirmathya navanītaṃ grahāya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā dhūpaṃ dahatāṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ dantairaspṛśya graset |
S08n689:1663: sarvagandhānāṃ vīravikrayakrītānāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ paṭasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpaṃ prajvālya svayameva mantraṃ japet |
S08n689:1664: tena puttalikāṃ kṛtvā saptānāmuparyaśvatthapatrāṇāmupario sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvat prasandhitā iti |
S08n689:1665: taṃ cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā yaṃ spṛśyati sa vaśo bhavati |
S08n689:1666: anenaiva vidhinā nāgakesaracūrṇasya pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā dhūpaśarāveṣu aṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:1670: goṣṭhaṃ gatvā paṭasyāgrataḥ apatitagomayena hastocchritaṃ stūpaṃ kṛtvā vidhivat pūjayitvā gugguluṃ dahatāṃ śatasahasraṃ japtavyam |
S08n689:1672: asaṃvatsarajātasya pradeśinīmaṅgulīṃ gṛhya hastapramāṇaṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā śmaśāne vidhivat pūjāṃ kṛtvā prāṅmukhopaviṣṭaḥ kuśasaṃstare tāmaṅguliṃ nivedya pradeśinyāṅgulyāvaṣṭabhya tāvajjaped yāvad raśmirniścarati |
S08n689:1674: kṛtarakṣāstā rājyaṃ gṛhya prabhāte tayāṅgulyā yamākarṣayati sa vaśaḥ |
S08n689:1675: trirātroṣitaḥ samānavatsāyā goḥ payasvinyāḥ kṣīraṃ gṛhya paṭasyāgrataḥ maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpaṃ prajvālya kuśasaṃstarasthamaṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā mṛdbhājane kṣīraṃ kuryāt |
S08n689:1677: tato maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā caturṣu diśāpālān sthāpya dvitīyamaṇḍale prabodhako sarṣapahastaḥ tṛtīyamaṇḍale susahāyo vā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā kṛtarakṣaḥ prāṅmukhopaviṣṭaḥ hastenāvaṣṭabhyaḥ tāvajjaped yāvadūṣmāyati dhūmāyati prajvalati |
S08n689:1678: prathamenāñjitākṣaḥ yaṃ paśyati ye ca paśyanti sarve te vaśā bhavanti |
S08n689:1681: antardhānikānāṃ aṣṭasahasrābhimantritā jvalita uditādityavaṇaḥ ratnālaṅkṛtaśarīraḥ kalpāntarasthāyī aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā śatrumadhye praviśed bhayaṃ na bhavati avadhyaḥ sarvaśatrūm |
S08n689:1682: āveśanaṃ śvetapuṣpeṇa nṛtyāpanamudakena trijaptena karavīrapuṣpeṇa trijaptenāharet |
S08n689:1685: añjanaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ vīrakrayakrītaṃ sauvīrāñjanaṃ gṛhya prāṇakānyapanīya pañcagavyenottaramukhayā pīṣayet |
S08n689:1686: anāmikayāṅgulyā catasro gulikā kṛtvā padmapatreṇācchādya śoṣayet |
S08n689:1687: paṭasyāgrataḥ vidhivadagniṃ prajvālya sahasrasampātāhutiṃ kṛtvā sadhātuke caitye udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā aṣṭabhirdigbhiḥ palāśakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya śikkakaṭipradeśe sthāpayet |
S08n689:1693: aṅguliṃ parijapya yaṃ tarjayati sa vaśo bhavati |

S08n689:1699: gorocanā manaḥśilāṃ vā paṭasyāgrataḥ sahasraṃ japet |
S08n689:1700: tena tilakaṃ kṛtvā yaṃ mṛgayati taṃ labhati |
S08n689:1703: śuklāṣṭamyā ahorātroṣitaḥ samudragāminīṃ nadīmavatīrya padmānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi nivedayet |
S08n689:1705: puruṣavaśīkaraṇe kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ ekarātropitaḥ bodhivṛkṣakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya kumudānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:1716: kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ ahorātroṣitaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ śleṣmātakaṃ kalikaṃ gṛhya raktasūtrakena veṣṭayet |
S08n689:1717: tataḥ palāśakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya kīlakaṃ aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā ekaikaṃ khaṇḍamekaviṃśativārāṃ parijapyāgnau prakṣipya prabhāte dīnāraśatāni labhati |
S08n689:1722: sāmānyamañjanamabhimantrya yaṃ prathamaṃ paśyati sa vaśo bhavati |
S08n689:1725: yathāniyataṃ parvataśikhare vā goṣṭhe pratītyasamutpādagarbhacaityaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya lakṣaṃ japed dīnāralakṣaṃ labhati |
S08n689:1726: nāgasthāne paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sukṛtarakṣāvidhānaḥ jambukāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya trimadhurāṃ baliṃ datvā nāgapuṣpāṇāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:1729: vaktavyaṃ ca ‘dine dine sapta dīnārāṃ prayaccha’ |
S08n689:1731: śenāpativaśīkaraṇe bṛhanmaṇḍalaka pralipya tasya padapāṃsumānīya vāmahastenāhutisahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:1733: sāmānyastrīvaśīkaraṇe lavaṇena pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā chitvā chitvā vāmahastena juhuyāt |
S08n689:1737: śālipiṣṭamayīṃ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā chitvā chitvā juhuyāt |

S08n689:2198: ātmanaḥ parasya vā saptarātreṇa grāmasya nagarasyānāvṛṣṭau trimadhuraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:2204: candragrahe sūryagrahe vā candanena maṇḍalakamupalipya ghṛtamadhu āmalakīrasaṃ samabhāgāni tāmrabhājane sthāpya paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā tāvajjaped yāvadūṣmāyati |
S08n689:2206: poṣadhiko vikāle udakaculakaṃ saptavārāṃ parijapya pātavyam |
S08n689:2208: śvetavacāṃ saptavārāṃ parijapya mukhe dantāntare prakṣipya yaṃ yācati taṃ labhate |
S08n689:2210: yaṃ yameva bhāvaṃ manasi kṛtvā japati taṃ tathāgatasya purataḥ puṣpagandhādīn dattvā diśābaliṃ ca caturdiśaṃ kṣipet |
S08n689:2213: valmīkamṛttikayā siṃhaṃ kṛtvā gorocanayā samālabhya paṭasyāgrataḥ kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ piṇḍakāṃ kṛtvā sthāpya lakṣatrayaṃ japet |
S08n689:2220: sarvavrīhigandhodakakalaśaṃ paripūrṇaṃ kalaśaṃ āmrapallavamukhapracchāditaṃ kṛtvā aṣṭasahasrābhimantritena vināyakaṃ snāpaya |
S08n689:2228: mahāsāmantavaśīkaraṇe paṭasyāgrataḥ arkasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt saptarātraṃ trisandhyam |
S08n689:2230: rājakanyāyai priyaṅgukusumānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt saptāhā yasya dīyate |
S08n689:2233: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ sadhātuke caitye lakṣaṃ japte bhikṣāhāraḥ |
S08n689:2234: tataḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ ekarātroṣitaḥ paṭasya yathāvibhavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā kṛṣṇatilānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:2238: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ nadītaṭe paścābhimukhaṃ paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya udakasaktavāhāraḥ yathāvibhavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpāṃ ekaviṃśatipradīpāṃ prajvālya bahiḥ sārvabhūtikāḥ baliṃ nivedya paryaṅkopaviṣṭaḥ tāvajjaped yāvadaruṇo devaputra āgacchati |
S08n689:2241: tataḥ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ gocarmamātraṃ sthaṇḍilakamupalipya sarvarasikaṃ baliṃ nivedyam |
S08n689:2242: bahiḥ sarvabhūtikaṃ baliṃ dattvā tataḥ kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ nirdhūmāṅgāreṣu guggulugulikānāṃ badarāsthipramāṇānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
S08n689:2245: sā bravīti ‘kiṃ karomīti’ mātā bhaginī sakhī eṣāmekatamaṃ grāhyam |
S08n689:2249: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ sadhātuke caitye yathāvibhavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā triḥkālasnāyī tṛsandhyaṃ ṣaṇmāsāṃ aparimito jāpaḥ |
S08n689:2252: kṛṣṇapakṣe puṣyanakṣatre karavīrikāṃ manaḥśilāṃ vīrakrayakrītāṃ gṛhya pañcagavyena saṃśodhya brāhmaṇakanyāṃ vāmoṣadhaṃ dattvā snānālaṅkṛtāṃ kṛtvā pūrvābhimukhe praviśya tithikaraṇamuhūrtena pīṣayet |
S08n689:2253: anāmikāṅgulyā viṣamāṃ badarāsthipramāṇāṃ gulikāṃ kṛtvā aśvatthasamudgake prakṣipya paṭasyāgrataḥ sahasrasampātābhihutaṃ kṛtvā saptarātroṣitaṃ ca ante śuklapakṣe udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā udāratarīṃ baliṃ nivedya gandhapuṣpadhūpārcitaṃ samudgakaṃ kṛtvā caturbhiraśvatthapatrai sthāpya tribhirācchādya hastenāvaṣṭabhya sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ namaskāraṃ kṛtvā kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ tāvajjaped yāvad rasarasāyanādīni dravyāni dadanti |
S08n689:2265: vastrakarṇake mṛṇmayīṃ mudrāṃ kṛtvā aṣṭasahasrābhimantrya daṣṭakopari sthāpayitvā ākarṣayet |
S08n689:2267: dravyāṇāṃ ca manaḥśilādīnāṃ khaḍgacakramusuṇḍyādīnāṃ pañcagavyena śodhayitvā sahasrasampātāhutiṃ kṛtvā anyatamaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhya pūrṇamāsyāṃ sādhanamaṇḍalaṃ likhya vastropari dravyaṃ sthāpya paryaṅkopaviṣṭaḥ tāvajjaped yāvat siddhirbhavati |
S08n689:2268: phalake yamicchati dravyaṃ tasya tasya nāmaṃ likhya aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā yatra nāgastiṣṭhati tatra hrade kṣeptavyā |
S08n689:2271: kūpe hrade vābhilaṣitavyaṃ nāmaṃ likhya dravyādīnāṃ phalake tathaiva hrade kṣeptavyam |
S08n689:2276: nadīsantārakādau daśaṣu ca sabhāyāṃ rājakule vā vivāde vā smartavyam |
S08n689:2278: yamicchati vaśaṃ kartum tasya mukhe āryamañjuśriyaṃ dhyātvā kiñcit sambhāṣaṇaṃ kuryāt |
S08n689:2283: tatroktena vidhānena maṇḍalaṃ praviṣṭa sampūrṇasya vṛṣasya apatitagomayaṃ gṛhya haviṣyāhāraḥ samaunī maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā tāvajjapet paurṇamāsyāṃ ārabhya yāvat tṛtīyamapi lakṣaṃ japet |
